WorkItem.Description:
I got a result file of some ordered (and nested) Coded UI Tests running with VS2010 and generated the HTML file from the results. 
 
The report only shows the total number of test methods and the number of passed/failed tests. 
It does not show the names of test single methods and if they passed/failed neither for the ordered Test nor for the singe tests….
 
(Attached Image)
Attatched trx & html
 
Is Coded UI Tests respectively nested Ordered Tests not supported?
Is this a known issue?
Or is there missing some thing?
 
 
I also tried beta 0.7. Only received exceptions …
